title: Shadowrun Dragonfall Directors Cut-CODEX
description:
:::::::::: CODEX PRESENTS ::::::::::


:::: Shadowrun Dragonfall Directors Cut ::::


::Information::


Release Date: 9/2014 Protection: Steam
Discs: 1 Genre: Adventure

2014's acclaimed RPG sleeper-hit Dragonfall is back! It's bigger
better, and now available for the first time as a standalone title

Extract
Burn or mount the .iso
Run setup.exe and install
copy crack from CODEX dir to installdir
Play

Block game exe in your firewall to prevent the game from trying to go
online

CODEX is currently looking for:

nothing but competition!

are you ready?

LNK^CPS 02/2014


::System Requirements::


OS: Windows XP SP3/Vista/Windows 7 
Processor: x86-compatible 1.4GHz or faster processor 
Memory: 2 GB RAM 
Graphics: DirectX compatible 3D graphics card with at least 
256MB of addressable memory 
DirectX: Version 9.0 
Hard Drive: 2 GB available space
